content: > **if you love this design please help us by adding it to your ravelry favorites and sharing it on your favorite social media facebook instagram twitter pinterest etc thank you ** > > ** 10% off all yarn at knitomatic com use discount code rav17 at check out 1 ** > one use per person we reserve the right to cancel offer at any time 1 https //knitomatic myshopify com/ **note pattern updated sept 9 2014 ** changes are mostly aesthetic the pattern is very simple fast and satisfying for time when you just need to produce something fast it is knit in the round using a really long circular needle and a nifty little cast on just for mobius knitting to learn this easy new skill you can watch cat bordhi s great intro to mobius knitting tutorial on you tube cat s instructions are clear and easy to follow and you ll be an expert in no time the yarn we ve used is hand-painted it is soft and has a slight sheen because of it s silk content please note that silk has a tendency to grow with wear so if you want your cowl bigger i suggest you block it bigger and if you want it smaller either subtract some sts from the cast on or reduce your needle size that said the look is big loose and casual and it s easy to go with the flow of this garment **size** s/m m/l tighter looser lying flat with mobius twist on top measured across the middles 14 x 7 5 **materials** 2 skeins manos silky wool colour 3113 50g 135m/150yds 30% silk 70% extra fine merino wool or 1 skein of malbrigo mecha 8mm/29 circular needles 1 stitch marker **gauge** holding 2 strands together in knit 4 row purl 4 row rib 12 sts & 20 r = 4 /10cm **techniques** intro to mobius knitting tutorial by cat bohrdi on youtube http //www youtube com/watch v=lvntda7f2v4
